abstract: A filing indicates that the fast-growing Internet company will seek to raise as much as $950 million in equity financing.
snippet: A filing indicates that the fast-growing Internet company will seek to raise as much as $950 million in equity financing.
lead_paragraph: Groupon, which earlier this month rebuffed a $6 billion takeover bid from Google, is preparing for a major round of fund-raising.

headline.main: Groupon Fund-Raising Plan Spurs Debate on Its Valuation
